page.title: 09WEEKEND IN WESTON ON TRENT
page.content: NEAR WESTON LOCK THERE IS A MUDSLOPE WHERE WE SLIDE DOWN A HILL. WE ALSO ENJOY SWIMMING IN THE RIVER AT KING'S MILLS. YOU CAN SWIM THERE BY THE WEIR AS IT IS QUITE SAFE. OFTEN THERE ARE CANOES ON THE RIVER AND FISHERMEN ON THE BANKS. ON SATURDAYS SOME OF US PLAY FOOTBALL ALL DAY. WE MAY BE ALLOWED TO PLAY OUT TILL 9.OO P.M. IN SUMMER. IN THE EVENING WE WATCH T.V. OR VIDEOS. SOMETIMES WE TAKE A PICNIC UP TO ASTON PLAYING FIELD. THERE ARE SWINGS, A CLIMBING FRAME, A SLIDE ABD A SEE-SAW. IN THE CORNER IS A SLOPE OF DRY HARD MUD WHICH IS FUN TO CLIMB ON. YOU CAN ALSO PLAY HIDE AND SEEK IN THE WOOD.WE ALSO PLAY ON THE NEW SCHOOL SITE WHERE THE P.T.A.AND THE PARISH COUNCIL HAVE PROVIDED GOAL POSTS AND NETS ON THE PITCH. UNFORTUNATELY PEOPLE EXERCISE THEIR DOGS IN SPITE OF A NOTICE.
